query.statement:
WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT A.PSPID, B.ZSITE_NM ,(CASE WHEN A.SURVEYGBN = 'A' THEN '°í°´»ç' WHEN A.SURVEYGBN = 'B' THEN 'Çù·Â»ç' ELSE '' END ) AS GBN
,(CASE WHEN A.SURVEYGBN = 'A' THEN (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.KNA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.KUNNR = A.RESPONDENT) WHEN A.SURVEYGBN = 'B' THEN (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.RESPONDENT) ELSE '' END) AS RESPONDENT_NM
,(CASE WHEN A.SURVEYGBN = 'B' THEN (SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.TEMNO = A.TEMNO) ELSE '' END) AS TEMNM ,A.MDATE ,A.MNAME AS MNAME_CD ,(SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.USERNUMB = A.MNAME) AS MNAME ,A.ANSWERDT ,(CASE WHEN A.DEVICE = 'A' THEN '¹®ÀÚ' WHEN A.DEVICE = 'B' THEN 'MSRM' ELSE '' END ) AS GBN2 ,(A.SURVEYGBN || '-' || A.SURVEYID) AS S_ID ,A.RESPONDENT ,A.SURVEYGBN, A.TEMNO, A.SURVEYID FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTSRYR AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID -- INNER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS C -- ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT -- AND A.RESPONDENT = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.SENDID = #SENDID#
AND A.MDATE BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
AND A.ANSWERDT BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
AND A.SURVEYGBN = #LFGBN#
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.ANSWERDT >= '19000101'
AND (A.ANSWERDT = '' OR A.ANSWERDT = '00000000')
)
SELECT T1.* FROM TEMP AS T1 GROUP BY T1.PSPID, T1.ZSITE_NM, T1.GBN, T1.TEMNM, T1.MDATE, T1.MNAME_CD, T1.MNAME, T1.ANSWERDT, T1.GBN2, T1.S_ID ,T1.RESPONDENT, T1.SURVEYGBN, T1.TEMNO, T1.SURVEYID, T1.RESPONDENT_NM
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
